unnormalised: The solar rooftop subsidies are a welcome step, potentially benefiting many like Mr. Sharma in Jaipur. Disbursal efficiency is key; delayed payments, as experienced with the Rs. 50,000 incentive in 2022, hinder adoption. Transparency regarding the MNRE's 31/03/2023 revised guidelines is also crucial. Further, clarifying the eligibility criteria for households consuming < 200 units/month by 10:00 hrs on 14/07/2024 would encourage broader participation. A national portal for tracking application status by 17:00 hrs will enhance accountability.
